div.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background: transparent;

width: 80%; height: 80%; background: white; border-radius: 20%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; font-size: 76.8px; color: #6366f1;
